column1: Hot Toys Star Wars Episode V 1/6 Han Solo (Action Figure);335;https://www.heo.com/de/it/product/HOT915015;MMS846;4895228623577;;"Han Solo rose from an impoverished childhood on the mean streets of Corellia to become one of the heroes of the Rebel Alliance. As captain of the Millennium Falcon
column2: Han and his co-pilot Chewbacca came to believe in the cause of galactic freedom
column3: joining Luke Skywalker and Princess Leia Organa in the fight against the Empire.

column1: Sideshow and Hot Toys are thrilled to introduce the Han Solo™ Sixth Scale Collectible Figure from Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back™. The figure includes a newly developed head sculpt with separate rolling eyeballs that convey Han's wit and resolve. His facial features are meticulously realized
column2: from natural skin texture and realistic scar
column3: to finely sculpted short brown hair. To enhance display options
column4: the figure includes thirteen interchangeable hands
column5: such as pistol-holding and opened pointing gesture hands
column6: to bring the beloved smuggler's expressive poses to life.

column1: Han's cold-weather outfit is faithfully recreated with exceptional detail
column2: beginning with a Hoth parka embedded with bendable wire
column3: layered over his jacket and his signature V-neck shirt. His utility belt holds greeblies and a blaster holster
column4: while his pants are proudly adorned with second-class Corellian bloodstripes. Completing the ensemble are long boots that perfectly complement his look on the frozen plains of Hoth. The Star Wars collectible comes equipped with a collection of iconic weapons and accessories. Included are a blaster pistol
column6: and protective goggles used during repairs on the Millennium Falcon
column7: a breath mask as seen when Han and his team discover they're inside an Exogorth
column8: and a droid caller. Each piece highlights a key moment of his Rebel journey
column9: capturing the spirit of adventure and resourcefulness that define the character.

column1: For fans of the galaxy far
column2: far away
column3: this is the definitive way to celebrate Han Solo's adventures on Hoth and beyond.";;;Hot Toys;Preordini Film e Videogiochi;;;;

column1: MDLX is a series of articulated figures that capture the spirit of Threezero's renowned DLX series at a smaller scale. It has a similar high range of articulation and enhanced durability

column1: Sideshow Frankenstein Premium Format (Statua);920;https://www.heo.com/de/it/product/SS300899;SS300899;747720265318;;"""It's alive! IT'S ALIVE!"" - Henry Frankenstein

column4: full-color tribute to Boris Karloff's performance as the iconic movie monster in Frankenstein (1931).

column1: Returning to our horror roots with the character that shocked our company to life

column3: lumbering silhouette. He stands framed by the walls of his master's castle
column4: the environment sculpture recreating the uneven stone walls and dilapidated wood floors of the mad doctor's domain. This high-end Universal Monsters statue also includes a pair of shackles as accessories that can either be placed along the base or attached to the figure's wrists for added presentation options.

column1: The Frankenstein Premium Format™ Figure features two distinct portraits of the monster's memorable visage. A neutral expression head and an emotive
column2: grimacing expression head can be swapped out at the neckline
column3: giving fans more ways to display the character in their collection. His cadaverous green complexion is marked with stitches
column6: as well as his signature neck bolts and distinctive hairline. You've never seen something undead look so alive before!

column1: Celebrate the legacy of Universal Monsters at Sideshow and bring home the Frankenstein Premium Format™ Figure your collection today.
